QuestData.Title: Secrets of the Ancients
QuestData.Description: It's become clear that the instability in the region has had an effect on its indigenous creatures.$b$bI've taken a particular interest in the Glacial Ancients and their recent adaptations. I suspect that their transformation into these 'Magic-bound' Ancients may hold clues to our predicament here.$b$bFor my studies, I'll need samples from both. Do hurry....
QuestData.LogDescription: Archmage Berinand in the Transitus Shield wants you to collect 3 Glacial Splinters and 3 Magic-Bound Splinters from the Ancients in Coldarra.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected the samples I requested?
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, yes. These shall do nicely.$b$bThank you, $r.
